snippet: Volkswagen, which has great sway in the auto industry, is focusing on plug-in hybrids while it plays down the immediate future for all-electric cars.
abstract: Many auto executives were not that enthusiastic about battery-powered cars at their outset, and now that sales of electric vehicles made by Tesla and Renault have been disappointing, some carmakers are playing down the technology; Volkswagen is focusing on plug-in hybrids.
lead_paragraph: Volkswagen, which has great sway in the auto industry, is focusing on plug-in hybrids while it plays down the immediate future for all-electric cars.

headline.seo: Electric Vehicles’ Weak Sales Have Automakers Thinking Twice
headline.main: Soft Sales Crimp Outlook for Electric Cars
headline.print_headline: Soft Sales Crimp Outlook for Electric Cars
